title: My download speed just keeps going down and down PLEASE HELP ME
body: At the moment my download speed is 100 kbps. It started at 400 kbps and has been going down ever since. SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME. Oh and it says I must wait for about 350 mins so yeah...

replies.body: It seems like your network is having problems keeping up, so you might run into issues if you're trying to patch.  Unless you're getting error messages, it's best to let it finish.  Cancelling before finishing can result in the client rescanning all your game files for corruption.  When you're caught up, check out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and resolve whatever is causing your network to drop like that.  I hope it helps!

If anyone can see this I just wanted to say that my download speed went back up to 200 kbps and then back to 100 kbps :P. I think my problem is that it goes down and up, my download speed. Now it's going down but the speed should come back up. I have turned peer to peer off. Thanks to everyone that helps me!
